original_text: As he came nearer, the Philistine looked carefully at David. He saw that David was no more than a healthy, handsome boy. That made him laugh at David.
korean_text: 그 블레셋 사람이 둘러보다가 다윗을 보고 업신여기니 이는 그가 젊고 붉고 용모가 아름다움이라

sentences.original_text: the Philistine looked carefully at David
sentences.korean_translation: 블레셋 사람은 다윗을 주의 깊게 바라보았습니다

sentences.original_text: He saw that David was no more than a healthy, handsome boy
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 다윗이 건강하고 잘생긴 소년에 불과하다는 것을 보았습니다

sentences.original_text: That made him laugh at David
